mapper.select: SELECT tj.uid,event_id as eid,ta.title FROM t_join tj left join event_res.t_activity ta on ta.id = tj.event_id where tj.status = 3;
select ta.* ,t.status as userStatus from t_join as t left join event_res.t_activity ta on ta.id = t.event_id where t.uid =#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from t_join where uid = ${uid} and event_id = ${event_id}
